title: Mozzarella Chicken in Basil Cream Sauce
instructions: Wash the meat and pat dry. Season with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a pan. Sear the fillets on all sides for about 5 minutes. Wash and halve the tomatoes. Pluck the basil leaves, wash, and finely chop. Bring cream to a boil in a pot. Stir in the cream cheese and let melt. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in 2/3 of the basil. Place meat and tomatoes in a greased baking dish. Pour the sauce over it. Cut the mozzarella into small pieces and distribute over the meat. Optionally, sprinkle grated parmesan and small flakes of herb butter on top. Bake in a preheated oven at 200 째C (upper/lower heat) or 175 째C (fan oven) for about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with remaining basil. Serve with croquettes or rice.
